name: Magnemts
description:
Use the power of MAGNEMTS to attract and repel your way to a NEW HIGH SCORE!

Magnemts is an infinite runner game where you avoid hazards and pick up bonuses, all of which is kept track of in your score.

Controls:
- Up: Jump
- R: Restart
- Alt+F4: Quit

Future Updates:
- Not likely

Credits:
- Designer/coder/artist: me
